div.font: Forest City Community School District is committed to ensuring that all material on its web site is accessible to students, faculty, staff, and the general public. If you experience difficulty with the accessibility of any web pages or documents, please contact webmaster@forestcity.k12.ia.us and request our materials in an alternate format.
